data.title: Lionel Richie - Latest news, views, gossip, photos and video
data.meta_description: Get the latest news on Lionel Richie from MailOnline.
data.text:
Lionel Richie says Carrie Underwood joining American Idol as judge 'makes a lot of sense' as he reacts to her new role: 'She's been there, done that'

Underwood, 41, was recently announced as the newest judge joining the show following Katy Perry's departure earlier this year.

Luke Bryan issues stark warning to Carrie Underwood as she prepares to join him as a judge on American Idol

The 41-year-old is going back to the same American Idol stage where her career began, but this time as a judge - and fellow star Luke Bryan has some advice for the newcomer.

Nicole Richie, 42, lands a new high-profile job... as she films a 'special' series with her Simple Life costar Paris Hilton

Nicole Richie rose to fame as a club kid in the early 2000s with her BFF and Simple Life co-star Paris Hilton. But these days She enjoys a different kind of bottle service.

Carrie Underwood is 'set to replace' Katy Perry as a judge on American Idol - the show that gave the country singer her start

Carrie Underwood is reportedly close to signing on to become a judge on American Idol, a show that gave the country singer her start. Underwood was the winner of season four in 2005.

Sofia Richie celebrates sister-in-law Alice Grainge's engagement in joyful FaceTime - over a year after her own lavish wedding to Elliot

The influencer, 25, and her pal Ali Meller were seen Facetiming Alice, who proudly flashed her dazzling diamond engagement ring.

Sofia Richie gives fans a rare glimpse of her newborn baby daughter Eloise as she has yet to share a look at her face... seven weeks after giving birth

Sofia Richie gave the world a rare glimpse at her adorable baby girl on Saturday. The 25-year-old social media personality shared a faceless photo of her seven-week-old daughter, Eloise.

Kathy Hilton says daughter Paris Hilton, 43, and longtime pal Nicole Richie, 42, are still like 'two little kids'... as they reboot The Simple Life

Paris Hilton and Nicole Richie are businesswomen, reality TV stars, wives, mothers and socialites at 43 and 42 years old. But when they get together they act like little kids.

Sofia Richie gives fans a rare glimpse at her newborn daughter Eloise - one month after giving birth

Sofia Richie gave the world a rare glimpse at adorable newborn daughter on Saturday.

Shania Twain hails Glastonbury legends gig a 'once in a lifetime invite', as she admits the music industry is intimidating for women

The Canadian singer-songwriter, 58, is set to take to the Pyramid Stage on Sunday June 30 for the coveted legends slot, filled by the likes of Johnny Cash and Diana Ross over the years.

The relentless march of Brand Beulah! Princess Beatrice owns TEN. (And there doesn't seem to be a royal woman who hasn't worn the British label...)

We speak to Beulah London co-founder, Lady Natasha Rufus Isaacs, on her inspiration behind the brand favoured by Catherine, Princess of Wales.

A-list acting coach reveals what it's REALLY like working with Lindsay Lohan, Suki Waterhouse and Lionel Richie

An acting coach to the stars has revealed what it is really like working with Hollywood's finest.

Keeping up with the nepo babies! North West's role in The Lion King has been criticised, but she's the latest in a long line of stars who got a leg up from their famous relatives

North played Young Simba during The Lion King's 30th Anniversary concert on Friday. The term 'nepo baby' was coined online and describes celebrity offspring who land easily in the world of showbiz.

Is this the world's most famous lobster shack? Maine eatery popular with Tom Cruise and Lionel Richie has lines stretching down highway for their $36 rolls

A Maine eatery dubbed 'the most famous lobster shack in the world' where customers line up for hours to buy one of their $36 rolls is officially open for the season.

Sofia Richie and Elliot Grainge pay touching tribute to his late mother in name of their new baby daughter

Sofia Richie and her husband Elliot Grainge paid tribute to his late mother in the name of their newborn daughter, who arrived on Monday.

Nicole Richie, 42, congratulates sister Sofia Richie on birth of daughter Eloise with husband Elliot Grainge as she declares: 'I now have a new favorite EG'

Nicole Richie is celebrating the birth of her younger sister Sofia Richie's first child.

Sofia Richie gives birth! The model, 25, and her husband Elliot Grainge, 30, welcome their first child, a baby girl named Eloise Samantha Grainge

Sofia Richie has welcomed her first child, it was shared on Friday. The model and her husband Elliot Grainge revealed on social media they welcomed Eloise Samantha Grainge.

Damian Lewis looks dapper in a grey suit as he cosies up to stylish girlfriend Alison Mosshart at the Prince's Trust Awards

Ahead of the event, the pair put on an animated display as they posed with umbrella's in the rain on the red carpet.

Lionel Richie says his daughter Sofia and her husband Elliot Grainge are 'about to have a nervous breakdown' in the weeks leading up to the birth of their child

The 74-year-old singer - who was recently joined by his much-younger girlfriend during a gala event - revealed that as the 26-year-old's due date grows closer, she was becoming anxious.

American Idol viewers in TEARS after new champion Abi Carter breaks down on stage and Katy Perry bows out - before teasing a potential return

The ABC show wrapped up with a jam-packed three-hour episode, which saw Will Moseley, Jack Blocker and Abi sing for survival in a bid to be crowned season 22 champion.

Katy Perry stuns in sequin co-ord and holds hands with fianc Orlando Bloom leaving American Idol wrap party - as she bows out after seven seasons

Katy Perry held hands with her fianc Orlando Bloom leaving the American Idol wrap party on Sunday night as she bows out after seven seasons on the hit show.

Katy Perry divides fans as she recreates her viral video flinging pizza slice into crowd during final American Idol appearance: 'Don't waste food'

During her last night on the American Idol stage, Katy Perry threw it back to a viral 2022 video of the Grammy nominee throwing slices of pizza into a Las Vegas crowd like frisbees

American Idol: Katy Perry cries on her last ever show after seven seasons as judge and winner Abi Carter breaks down in tears too after being crowned season 22 champion in ABC finale

Abi Carter, 21, was crowned the winner of season 22 of American Idol on Sunday's star-studded three-hour epic finale on ABC that also was Katy Perry's last as a judge.

Katy Perry gets emotional while taking stage for last time as judge on American Idol after surprisingly revealing in February she was leaving

Katy Perry, 39, got emotional while stepping onto the stage on Sunday for her last episode as a judge on American Idol on ABC.

Charlie's Angels! As Maya Jama's friendship with King Charles is revealed, how Alan Titchmarsh, Geri Horner, Lionel Richie and Jay Blades are among the celebrity names in the court of the star-friendly monarch

The King has been building friendships with some of the UK's most-loved national treasures for decades; from Judi Dench and Lionel Richie to Alan Titchmarsh and Jay Blades .

Katy Perry's daughter Daisy, 3, is seen in a very rare photo as she sits on dad Orlando Bloom's lap while mom turns into Cinderella on American Idol

Katy Perry and fianc Orlando Bloom don't often take their daughter into public with them, but Mother's Day was an exception. Mom was Cinderella.

American Idol: Loretta Lynn's granddaughter Emmy Russell and teenager Triston Harper surprisingly exit as field narrows to final three

Loretta Lynn's granddaughter Emmy Russell, 25, and teenager Triston Harper, 15, were eliminated on Sunday's live two-hour Disney Night episode of American Idol on ABC.

Katy Perry celebrates Mother's Day by reflecting on pregnancy journey with daughter Daisy Dove including moments she told American Idol co-stars Lionel Richie and Luke Bryan and fianc Orlando Bloom

Katy Perry, 39, shared her pregnancy journey with her daughter Daisy Dove in a Mother's Day tribute posted on Instagram.

Chloe Sims, 42, and Lionel Richie's son Miles, 29, 'SPLIT!' Couple call time on their whirlwind four-month romance

The couple have called on their whirlwind romance just four months since they started dating.

Sofia Richie shows off her baby bump at nine months pregnant in a tiny white tank top: 'Waiting on you baby girl!'

Lionel Richie's daughter Sofia shared a sweet snap of her burgeoning baby bump as she posed from the side for her more than 11 million Instagram followers on Monday.

American Idol: Luke Bryan gushes about Abi Carter after she covers Hello on Adele Night as field narrows to five

Luke Bryan, 47, was blown away by Abi Carter's performance of Adele 's hit Hello on Sunday's live two-hour Adele Night episode of American Idol on ABC.

TV royalty Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly are snubbed by King Charles as they're written out of his Coronation scroll

Part of a 700-year tradition, the 21-metre scroll records the ceremonies, processions and who was there in the Abbey to witness the Coronation.

Inside King Charles and Zara Tindall's sweet relationship: Monarch and his niece share a close bond and aren't afraid to break royal tradition with public displays of affection

King Charles was embraced by his niece Zara Tindall today as he made a surprise appearance at the Royal Windsor Horse Show.

A hug for the niece! Smiling King Charles is embraced by Zara Tindall at the Royal Windsor Horse Show just days after monarch returned to official public duties following cancer diagnosis

Zara Tindall gave her Uncle Charles a big hug today as the King made a surprise appearance at the Royal Windsor Horse Show while his cancer treatment continues.

Emily Ratajkowski flaunts her ample cleavage in an extreme plunging satin gown as she attends The King's Trust Global Gala

Emily Ratajkowski made sure all eyes were on her in an extreme plunging gold gown at the The King's Trust 2024 Global Gala in New York City on Thursday.

Lionel Richie says his friend King Charles is 'doing fantastic': Singer, who performed at monarch's coronation concert, says Charles is 'doing well' but 'needs to sit still' as he continues his cancer treatment

Lionel Richie, who has been friends with the King since the 1980s after meeting through the Prince's Trust , described Charles as 'well' and 'doing fantastic' as he hosted an event in New York.

Katherine Jenkins, 43, stuns in regal purple gown as she attends King's Trust Global Gala in New York City

The Welsh opera singer, 43, was the epitome of royal chic in a fabulous off-the-shoulder ball gown which featured ruffled tulle sleeves.

Lionel Richie, 74, and girlfriend Lisa Parigi, 34, make a stylish pair as they attend The King's Trust 2024 Global Gala at Casa Cipriani in New York

Lionel Richie and girlfriend Lisa Parigi were among a number of stars attending The King's Trust 2024 Global Gala at Casa Cipriani in New York on Thursday.

Teyana Taylor looks fierce in towering platform boots while carrying a jeweled camera-shaped clutch at The King's Trust Global Gala in NYC

Teyana Taylor looked effortlessly cool in an all-black ensemble when she graced the red carpet of the King's Trust Global Gala on Thursday in New York City.

Chrissy Teigen glows in a sheer black dress as she puts on a cute display with John Legend at King Charles' charity The King's Trust Global Gala in NYC

Chrissy Teigen and her husband John Legend looked as loved up as ever on Thursday evening when they attended the King's Trust Global Gala in New York City.

Kate Moss, 50, stuns in a shimmering silver gown as she joins close friend Charlotte Tilbury at the star-studded King's Trust Global Gala in New York City

The event was founded in the United Kingdom by King Charles III with the aim of helping disadvantaged young people.

A royally star-studded gala! Emily Ratajkowski, Dominic West, Sam Smith, Lionel Richie and Kate Moss attend New York bonanza for King Charles' charity in first major event since The Prince's Trust was renamed The King's Trust

The event, held in New York, was hosted by King's Trust Global Ambassadors Lionel Richie and Edward Enninful OBE.

Sofia Richie lifts up top to display her baby bump... as she awaits arrival of first child with husband Elliot Grainge

The influencer, 25, shared a snap of her bare bump as she posed in the mirror Wednesday morning. She lifted her teal top to showcase her growing midsection and wrote in the photo, 'Morning.'

Lionel Richie, 74, and girlfriend Lisa Parigi, 34, enjoy dinner date in Los Angeles

The American Idol judge - who recently gave a 'major compliment' to one of the show's contestants - opted for a nearly all-black outfit that was comprised of a zip-up jacket, t-shirt and matching pants.

American Idol: Katy Perry leads the charge as judges rush the stage and hug Kayko as field narrows to Top 10

Katy Perry, Luke Bryan and Lionel Richie rushed the stage after Kayko stunned them with his rock version of Goyte's hit song Somebody That I Used to Know on Monday's episode of American Idol.

Katy Perry cuts a glamorous figure in a burgundy gown with a saucy front slit as she attends American Idol Season 22 event at The Aster in LA

Katy Perry put on a glamorous display on Monday, as she attended the American Idol Season 22 Top 10 event at The Aster in Los Angeles.

Katy Perry dazzles in a shimmering turquoise dress as she playfully sticks out her tongue with KISS legend Gene Simmons on set of American Idol

Katy Perry dazzled in a shimmering dress and had a bit of fun as she playfully stuck out her tongue with KISS legend, Gene Simmons, on set of American Idol on Sunday.

American Idol: Luke Bryan gets teased for falling while performing by Ryan Seacrest and Katy Perry as field narrows to Top 12 on ABC show

Luke Bryan, 47, got teased by Ryan Seacrest, 49, and Katy Perry, 39, on Sunday's live episode of American Idol after the country star fell on stage while performing in Canada.

Sofia Richie celebrates her first wedding anniversary with Elliot Grainge in sweet post: 'I want to marry you a million times over again'

Sofia Richie celebrated her first wedding anniversary with husband Elliot Grainge on Sunday.

Chloe Sims, 42, gets cosy with Netflix exec on glam London night out... days after clarifying relationship status with Lionel Richie's son Miles, 29

Chloe Sims, 42, got cosy with a Netflix exec at the Chiltern Firehouse on Thursday night days after clarifying her relationship - or lack thereof - with Lionel Richie's son.

Nicole Richie says she has always been 'very transparent' about wild child past with her two children: 'I was preparing for the internet since day one'

Nicole Richie revealed she has always been 'open' about her wild child past in the mid-2000s with her daughter Harlow, 16, and son Sparrow, 14.

Katy Perry thinks Jelly Roll would be a good replacement for her after she leaves American Idol at the end of the season: 'He could sell me anything'

Katy Perry has an idea or two about who should replace her as a judge on American Idol after the current season comes to an end. She did not name a female to replace her, but rather a male.

Sofia Richie puts her baby bump on display in a white dress as she debuts her spring shoe collection with Stuart Weitzman

Sofia Richie debuted a new footwear collection with Stuart Weitzman on Tuesday. She accentuated her growing baby bump in an advert dedicated to her impending entry into motherhood.

Orlando Bloom leaves a cheeky comment as his fiance Katy Perry shares sexy snaps of her quirky metallic American Idol outfit

Orlando Bloom left a cheeky comment under one of his fiance Katy Perry's Instagram snaps on Monday.

Katy Perry suffers a wardrobe malfunction on American Idol as behind the scenes video shows her frantically trying to fix her designer top: 'This is a family show!'

Katy Perry felt the full power of music on Monday night's episode of American Idol, joking that a performance had made her top break.

Ryan Seacrest is in TEARS on American Idol and is comforted by Luke Bryan after emotional performance from Loretta Lynn's granddaughter: 'I'm crying'

Ryan Seacrest couldn't contain his emotions after a moving performance by Loretta Lynn's granddaughter Emmy Russell on Sunday night's episode of American Idol.

Chloe Sims, 42, reveals the TRUTH behind romance with Lionel Richie's son Miles, 29, and the glamorous night they met at an Emmys party with Megan Fox

Chloe Sims has revealed she is 'seeing what happens' with 'handsome' Miles Richie after he came onto her at an Emmys party.

American Idol: Luke Bryan congratulates Julia Gagnon, 21, for stunning transformation as she gains last spot in Top 20 on ABC show

Luke Bryan, 47, was stunned by the transformation Julia Gagnon, 21, made from her audition to winning a spot in the show's Top 20 on Sunday's episode of American Idol.

Katy Perry recalls 'couch surfing' and getting 'cars repossessed' while trying desperately to break into the industry

Katy Perry recalled her early struggles to break into the music industry, including getting her car repossessed and spending her early twenties 'couch surfing.'

Nicole Richie cuts a statuesque look in skintight gold dress as she arrives at The Kelly Clarkson Show in NYC to promote new movie

As she continues promoting her role in the upcoming Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead remake, Nicole Richie is serving look after look during her press tour around New York City

Pregnant Sofia Richie shows off her bump in a stylish maternity dress as she goes shopping for baby clothes in Beverly Hills - as due date approaches

Sofia Richie is close to welcoming her first child with husband Elliot Grainge.

Nicole Richie shows off her stunning figure in stylish little black dress as she steps out after appearing on The Drew Barrymore Show in NYC

While promoting her new role in the upcoming remake of Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, Nicole Richie served a chic look in a little black dress at CBS Studios in New York City

American Idol: Lionel Richie gives 'major compliment' to McKenna Faith Breinholt as Top 24 perform in Hawaii

Lionel Richie, 74, stunned McKenna Faith Breinholt, 25, after he gave her a 'major compliment' on Sunday's episode of American Idol on ABC.

Sofia Richie covers up her growing baby bump with a chic velvet robe while leaving Beverly Hills party with husband Elliot Grainge

The 25-year-old social media personality was joined by her husband, Elliot Grainge , as she stepped out of the function's venue before making her way home.

Meet Nicole Richie and Joel Madden's look-alike kids! Couple's rarely seen daughter Harlow, 16, and son Sparrow, 14, make red carpet debut at premiere of Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead

Nicole Richie and Joel Madden's rarely seen kids made their red carpet debut on Tuesday, as they supported their mom at the premiere of her film Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead in Los Angeles.

UK Eurovision flop Michael Rice wows American Idol with jaw-dropping audition that leaves Lionel Richie and Katy Perry in tears

A UK Eurovision singer has tried his luck across the pond on hit US show American Idol.

Nicole Richie is given an awkward reminder of the moment she set fire to her own HAIR as her husband Joel Madden pokes fun at the viral gaffe

The daughter of Motown legend Lionel Richie went viral in 2021 - albeit for the wrong reason - after an outdoor party held in honour of her milestone 40th birthday went awry.

American Idol: Katy Perry fakes out Abi Carter before revealing she made the Top 24 during Judgment episode

Katy Perry, 39, tricked Abi Carter, 21, into believing she was being eliminated during the Showstopper/Final Judgment episode of American Idol on Monday on ABC.

American Idol contestant is slammed for her 'disgusting' and 'rude' attitude after she stopped live performance to criticize her pianist - before making low blows about judge Luke Bryan

Madai ChaKell, 22, from Springfield, Massachusetts, caused quite the stir on Sunday's episode of the singing competition during Hollywood Night.

American Idol: Katy Perry, Luke Bryan and Lionel Richie eliminate more than HALF of the field in the new Idol Arena for Hollywood week... in the biggest cut in the show's history

Katy Perry, Luke Bryan and Lionel Richie made the tough call to cut down the remaining contestants to less than half on Sunday's tense two-hour episode of American Idol's Hollywood Week in ABC.

Sofia Richie shows off her statuesque body in skimpy clothes as she brings back the 1960s in retro chic shoot for Sol De Janeiro

The open design of one of her dresses hinted at Sofia's statuesque physique, which is now undergoing changes as she expects a baby girl with her husband Elliot Grainge.

Say you, say reem! TOWIE star Chloe Sims, 42, confirms new romance with Motown legend Lionel Richie's son Miles, 29, as unlikely lovebirds share a kiss in Los Angeles

Love conquered all for Chloe, better known for her regular appearances on The Only Way Is Essex, during what appeared to be a romantic date night with Miles Richie in Beverly Hills.

American Idol: Alyssa Ragu returns and gains golden ticket to Hollywood after stealing spotlight from close friend Julia Davo during audition

Previous contestant Alyssa Ragu, 21, outshined her own friend who was auditioning for a chance to go to Hollywood on Sunday's two-hour episode of American Idol on ABC.

Chloe Sims shows off her enviable figure in a strapless sparkling teal leotard as she enjoys a night out with Joey Essex and Vas J Morgan in LA

The former TOWIE star, 42, turned heads in a sparkling teal leotard as she showed off her curves after enjoying a night out with her cousin Joey Essex and pal Vas J Morgan.

X Factor star Scarlett Lee looks unrecognisable as she wows Katy Perry on American Idol - six years after coming second in British competition

The bubbly makeup artist became an instant fan favourite on The X Factor and was also instantly recognisable with her incredibly deep fake tan .

American Idol: Katy Perry does NOT like it when Madai Chakell covers her 2008 debut single I Kissed A Girl

Madai Chakell, 22, boldly covered I Kissed A Girl by Katy Perry, but the pop star while serving as a judge on Sunday's episode of American Idol did not like it.

Sofia Richie reveals she had teen acne starting at age 13 and now battles dermatitis: 'I've dealt with skin struggles my whole life'

Sofia Richie took to Instagram as she showed off her clear skin in an ambassadorship with SkinCeuticals. The daughter of legend Lionel Richie looked beautiful as she wore natural makeup.
